poem:
**Vandalism by Post**

A flame-kissed note,  
charred words,  
the pillar box  
a pyre,  
ash-strewn dreams  
scatter  
like embers,  
lost to the silence  
of smoldering letters;  
hopes ignite,  
fall softly  
as soot  
on deserted streets  
of Nottingham's  
past.
